text:
@SenSchumer That's exactly what they want it's a perfect crime keep as many POSSIBLE under their knees and get as many possible infected and let COVID-19 do the KILLING for THEM; BEHOLD THE LATEST CUTTING EDGE LYNCHINGS WITHOUT LIFTING A FINGER.
AND HE CALLS FBI SCUM- THEY R THE HYPOCRITES!
